Body:
Welcome to Rangamati Science and Technology University!

Welcome, {{receiverDisplayName}}!

Congratulations on your decision to join Rangamati Science and Technology University! We are excited to have you on board. To complete your registration process, please click on the verification link below:

Verify Your Account

Please make sure to verify your account within the next 7 days to confirm your membership. If the link above does not work, you can copy and paste the following URL into your browser: {{verificationLink}}.

Once your account is verified, you will gain access to your personal dashboard, where you can find important onboarding documents, training materials, and other resources to help you get started.

If you encounter any issues during the verification process or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to our support team at {{universityHelpEmail}} or call us at {{universityHelpPhone}}. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Welcome to Rangamati Science and Technology University! We look forward to working with you and wish you a successful and fulfilling journey with us.

Best regards,
{{senderName}}
{{senderPosition}}
Rangamati Science and Technology University
Subject: Email verification for signup
